name: Boneless Leather
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Magic Items/Armor/Specific Armors/Boneless Leather

Construction.Requirements: Craft Magic Arms and Armor, alter self, creator must have 5 ranks in the Acrobatics and Escape Artist skills

sections.body: This suit of +1 leather gives its wearer the ability to twist and contort his body in virtually any direction. He gains a +5 bonus on Escape Artist checks, a +5 bonus on Acrobatics checks to reduce damage from falls, a +5 bonus to CMD, and DR 5/piercing or slashing.
sections.name: Description
